title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Community Addons - Be informed about an update
description:
In this video I will show you a quick trick how you can stay up-to-date with your favorite community addons by subscribing to updates on flightsim.to. A feature which I am using a lot and will make it easier to stay informed if an update is available for an addon.
